synopsis.text:
Hakkai, Goku, Gojyo, and their monk leader, Genjo Sanzo, press onward in their quest to thwart the revival of a malevolent demon in the West. Their journey is far from easy, as they face constant challenges from rogue Yokais and relentless assassins dispatched by Kougaiji. Amidst these trials, the unity of the group is tested, especially when they cross paths with two enigmatic Western strangers, Hazel and Gato.

Hazel, a foreign monk, and his Indian-looking partner, Gato, share a common enemy with Sanzo's group: the Yokais. After witnessing the brutal murder of his mentor by a Yokai, Hazel has vowed to eradicate all such creatures. Initially, their shared objective and tragic pasts foster a bond between Hazel and Sanzo. However, the harmony is threatened when Hazel discovers that Sanzo's companions are also Yokais. Will this revelation turn these potential allies into formidable foes?

As they navigate through perilous encounters and moral dilemmas, the quartet remains resolute in their mission. From aiding towns plagued by demon invasions to skirmishes with ursine adversaries, their days are filled with unending adventures. Will they reach India and achieve their goal, or will internal strife and external threats derail their mission? Only time will tell in this thrilling, action-packed anime.
